projects.Title: Personal Site
projects.Bio: This website is developed by me! I made this to get started in webdev and show off both my creative and technical skills.

projects.Title: Home Server
projects.Bio: I had an old desktop PC that I didn't want to go to waste. I now have my own remote storage and I personally host this site.

projects.Title: DMM Emulation
projects.Bio: I solo-developed a script for the DMM6500 to emulate a Keysight 34461A. I pushed Tek's TSP scripting to it's limit, creating custom parsing and execution functions.

projects.Title: TEK Projects
projects.Bio: Over my six months at Tektronix I had multiple significant public projects including a capacitance measuring app and over 20 demonstrations for the MP5000 Series instruments.

projects.Title: Auto Maze Robot
projects.Bio: I served as lead programmer in the creation of a maze-solving robot. I put my algorithm knowlege to work and learned to avoid simulated hazards with magnetic and IR sensors.

projects.Title: Advent of Code
projects.Bio: I love to challenge myself and the annual Advent of Code is perfect. When I need a brain teaser or to use a new language I love to try out one of these problems.

projects.Title: Quadrupedal Walker
projects.Bio: This was one of my first "real" projects. I learned to 3D model and print, simple inverse kinematics, and my first programs. While it only took a few steps this sparked my love of engineering.
